svg.text: AI-Powered Learning System for Continuous Review Quality Improvement

g.text: • 92% pattern matching accuracy with continuous improvement
• 15+ actionable insights generated per review session
• Real-time adaptation to team-specific patterns and preferences
• 87% prediction reliability for review outcomes and quality improvements
• Processing Speed: <2 seconds for pattern analysis and recommendation generation
• Continuous Learning: Real-time adaptation with every review session
• Team Customization: 94% accuracy in team-specific pattern recognition

svg.title: Review Pattern Recognition Engine - AI Learning System for Continuous Review Quality Improvement
svg.desc: Interactive visualization of AI pattern recognition system showing neural network processing, learning evolution timeline, pattern categories, and real-time performance metrics. Demonstrates how intelligent review systems learn from historical data to continuously improve review accuracy and efficiency.
